trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a promotion fails.

This exception should be thrown by an implementation of <xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification> interface to indicate that a call to <xref:System.Transactions.ITransactionPromoter.Promote%2A> has failed.
trans-unit.target: 구현에 따라이 예외를 throw 해야 <xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification> 임을 나타내는 인터페이스에 대 한 호출 <xref:System.Transactions.ITransactionPromoter.Promote%2A> 실패 했습니다.

trans-unit.source: If an implementation of <xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification> fails a promotion due to an exception that is not fatal, it should catch that exception and create a <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException> with the original exception as the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 구현이 <xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification> 해당 예외를 catch 하 고 작업을 만들 심각 하지 않은 예외로 인해 수준 올리기에 실패 한 <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException> 내부 예외로 원래 예외를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException" /> class.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 예외가 발생한 이유를 설명하는 메시지가 포함된 <see cref="T:System.String" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException" /> class with the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 메시지를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that describes a failed serialization.
A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that describes a failed serialization context.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException" /> class with the specified serialization and streaming context information.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 serialization과 스트리밍 컨텍스트 정보를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 예외가 발생한 이유를 설명하는 메시지가 포함된 <see cref="T:System.String" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception instance that causes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 현재 예외를 발생시키는 예외 인스턴스를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException" /> class with the specified message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 메시지 및 내부 예외를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.
